query:
SELECT
                id,
                memory_type,
                category,
                subject,
                content,
                context_text,
                priority,
                confidence as "confidence: f32",
                source_task_id,
                source_context_id,
                tags,
                metadata,
                created_at,
                updated_at,
                last_accessed_at,
                access_count,
                expires_at,
                is_active
            FROM soul_memories
            WHERE is_active = TRUE
              AND (expires_at IS NULL OR expires_at > NOW())
              AND (
                  content ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
                  OR subject ILIKE '%' || $1 || '%'
                  OR $1 = ANY(tags)
              )
              AND ($2::TEXT IS NULL OR memory_type = $2)
              AND ($3::TEXT IS NULL OR category = $3)
            ORDER BY priority DESC, created_at DESC
            LIMIT $4
